mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_relation AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission_relation AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
select p.* from sys_permission as p left join sys_request_path_permission_relation as ppr on p.id = ppr.url_id left join sys_request_path as rp on ppr.url_id = rp.id where rp.url = #{requestUrl};
